title: 94/506/EC: Commission Decision of 27 July 1994 amending Commission Decision 94/70/EC establishing a provisional list of third countries from which Member States authorize imports of raw milk, heat-treated milk and milk-based products (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 27 July 1994 amending Commission Decision 94/70/EC establishing a provisional list of third countries from which Member States authorize imports of raw milk, heat-treated milk and milk-based products (Text with EEA  relevance) (94/506/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex of Decision 94/70/EC the line referring to Israel is hereby amended as follows:
"" ID="1">'IL> ID="2">Israel> ID="3">0> ID="4">X> ID="5">X'">
This Decision is addressed to Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 14. 9. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 36, 8. 2. 1994, p. 5.
